hero.heading: Let’s craft premium web experiences that convert.
hero.description: I design and ship custom web platforms by combining UX thinking, responsive front-end, and scalable APIs. My approach blends fast delivery, an obsession for detail, and end-to-end product guidance.

insightsList: Concise summary of 4 years delivering as freelancer and embedded product teammate (React, FastAPI, .NET, DevOps).
Highlights measurable impact (performance boosts, process automation, productivity gains).
Cross-functional skills: architecture, design systems, data pipelines, CI/CD, applied AI.
Structured to match expectations from agencies and product-led teams.

contact.title: Ready to accelerate your product?
